Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)
The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
mike \mike\ n. [shortened from microphone.] A {microphone}, the device for converting sound waves into electrical energy. [informal]
Syn: microphone. [WordNet 1.5]
mike n : device for converting sound waves into electrical energy [syn: {microphone}]
